author: TMYM
title: Two small mistakes in the most prominent places
review:
The eyes aren't circular enough. It doesn't capture the American football shape. Also the sticker for the breathing mask doesn't extend nearly as much as it should.

Apart from that it's great. The helm is well shaped and the studded look is fine. The tube details and the neck details all work to make this set look great, if not totally accurate

The price is fine in the UK, just £5 more than most of the other helmets, but $70 seems expensive to me

author: _Nedski_
title: Classic Must Have
review:
Biggest set to date @ 824, a little challenging with the black pieces. Instruction booklet needs some attention especially with the black helmets.

5/5 a must have in your collection
